tagfield.h
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 /*H*************************************************************************************/
2 /*!
3  \File tagfield.h
4 
5  \Description
6  This module provides routines to insert/extract tagged data into a free-form text buffer.
7  Several data types are provided to allow the representation to be as natural as possible
8  (i.e., the Binary routine could be used for everthing, but it is much more difficult to
9  decode externally than the String routine).
10 
11  \Copyright
12  Copyright (c) Electronic Arts 2000-2004. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
13 
14  \Version 1.0 01/23/2000 (gschaefer) First version
15  \Version 1.1 04/03/2002 (gschaefer) Removed sscanf dependency
16  \Version 1.2 01/29/2003 (gschaefer) Changed calling to signed char
17  \Version 2.0 12/10/2004 (gschaefer) Redesigned "set" logic to avoid stack use
18 */
19 /*************************************************************************************H*/
20 
21 #ifndef _tagfield_h
22 #define _tagfield_h
23 
24 /*!
25 \Moduledef TagField TagField
26 \Modulemember Util
27 */
28 //@{
29 
30 /*** Include files *********************************************************************/
31 
32 #include "DirtySDK/platform.h"
33 
34 /*** Defines ***************************************************************************/
35 
36 /*** Macros ****************************************************************************/
37 
38 // clear the data buffer
39 #define TagFieldClear(record, reclen) (record)[0] = (0)
40 
41 // save an entire structure as a single field
42 #define TagFieldSetStruct(record, reclen, name, bin, pat) TagFieldSetStructure(record, reclen, name, bin, -1, pat)
43 
44 // get packed structure field contents
45 #define TagFieldGetStruct(data, buf, pat) TagFieldGetStructure(data, buf, -1, pat)
46 
47 // get binary field contents using more efficient encoding
48 #define TagFieldGetBinary7(data, buffer, buflen) TagFieldGetBinary(data, buffer, buflen)
49 
50 // old TagFieldSetCopy is now implemented via new TagFieldSetRaw function
51 #define TagFieldSetCopy(record, reclen, name, source) TagFieldSetRaw(record, reclen, name, TagFieldFind(source, name))
52 
53 // unsigned version of TagFieldSetNumber
54 #define TagFieldSetUnsignedNumber(_pRecord, _iRecLen, _pName, _uValue) TagFieldSetNumber(_pRecord, _iRecLen, _pName, (signed)(_uValue))
55 
56 // unsigned version of TagFieldGetNumber
57 #define TagFieldGetUnsignedNumber(_pData, _uDefVal) (unsigned)TagFieldGetNumber(_pData, (signed)(_uDefVal));
58 
59 
60 /*** Type Definitions ******************************************************************/
61 
62 // Define the different types supported by TagFieldGet/SetStructure patterns
63 typedef enum
64 {
65  TAGFIELD_PATTERN_INT8 = 'b', // int8_t
66  TAGFIELD_PATTERN_INT16 = 'w', // int16_t
67  TAGFIELD_PATTERN_INT32 = 'l', // int32_t
68  TAGFIELD_PATTERN_STR = 's' // string
69 } TagFieldPatternE;
70 
71 // Pointer structure to allow enumeration of TagFieldSetStructure() encoded attrs
72 typedef struct TagFieldStructPtrT
73 {
74  TagFieldPatternE eType; // The type of the attribute
75  int32_t iOffset; // Offset from structure pointer where attr lives
76 } TagFieldStructPtrT;
77

86 // set the default field divider character
87 DIRTYCODE_API char TagFieldDivider(char iDivider);
88 
89 // convert a tag buffer to use specified marker char
90 DIRTYCODE_API void TagFieldFormat(char *record, unsigned char marker);
91 
92 // search the buffer and locate the named field
93 DIRTYCODE_API const char *TagFieldFind(const char *record, const char *name);
94 
95 // search the buffer and locate the two-part named field (the names are catenated together)
96 DIRTYCODE_API const char *TagFieldFind2(const char *record, const char *name1, const char *name2);
97 
98 // search the buffer and locate the indexed named field (eg NAME5)
99 DIRTYCODE_API const char *TagFieldFindIdx(const char *pRecord, const char *pName, int32_t iIdx);
100

102 DIRTYCODE_API int32_t TagFieldDelete(char *record, const char *name);
103

146

148 DIRTYCODE_API int32_t TagFieldSetFloat(char *pRecord, int32_t iReclen, const char *pName, float fValue);
149 
150 // store raw field contents in a record
151 DIRTYCODE_API int32_t TagFieldSetRaw(char *pRecord, int32_t iReclen, const char *pName, const char *pData_);
152 
153 // merge two records together (does not merge bulk data)
154 DIRTYCODE_API int32_t TagFieldMerge(char *record, int32_t reclen, const char *merge);

191 
192 // get floating point number
193 DIRTYCODE_API float TagFieldGetFloat(const char *pData, float fDefval);
194

197

199 DIRTYCODE_API const char *TagFieldFindNext(const char *pRecord, char *pName, int32_t iNameSize);
